settings.title: CONSULTATIONS
settings.subtitle: Douglas Pereira believes the key to achieving beautiful healthy-looking skin begins with a conversation about your skin’s history and its current condition. Your skin’s future awaits with a consultation with one of our skin experts.

settings.title: Virtual Video or Phone consultation
settings.text:
Get advice and be guided by our skin experts with selecting the perfect home care regime for your skin.

The complementary virtual consultation gives you the opportunity to receive skin advice from wherever you are.

Our skin experts can talk to you about your skin challenges and goals, support you on your skin journey and assist you with selecting the perfect homecare for your skin.

settings.title: In clinic discovery consultation
settings.text:
Visit our flagship clinic for a face-to-face consultation in our skin discovery zone.

The Complimentary in clinic discovery consultation is set within our flagship clinic where we have a dedicated skin discovery zone, with all our products so you can experience each formulation.

Our skin experts will be able to conduct a face-to-face consultation with you, analyse your skin and assist you with selecting the perfect homecare regime.

settings.title: In clinic signature consultation
settings.text:
The in-clinic signature consultation is conducted within your own private treatment room in our flagship clinic and commences with an in-depth conversation about your skin challenges and goals.

Followed by a discovery treatment to get to understand your skins better.

Your consultation concludes
with the advice and recommendations for the best solutions for your skin.

We have four pathways to assist you with selecting your skincare needs and overcoming your skin challenges. Take the Online Skincare Regime Builder Questionnaire for your personalized homecare regime or book one of three consultations with our skin experts.

Douglas Pereira believes the key to achieving beautiful healthy-looking skin begins with a conversation about your skin’s history and its current condition. Your skin’s future is just one step away.

Select the below pathway that best suits you, and one of our skin experts will be in contact to start your skin journey.
